name: Midterm and Week 4
description:
This project contains my progress in  my Motion Capture class
This has all of my old projects as well as the my newer ones, being Week 4 and the Midterm
Week 4 has the following:

  • skinned with Mixamo or similar
  • 40 seconds
  • Motion Controllers and hand movements in iPiSoft
  • Audio - Clip made by me with dialogue and sound effects
  • Storyboard

The Midterm has the following:

  • 130-seconds
  • three actors
    •  One hard body character
    • TWO skinned characters from Mixamo
  • The actors are interacting with each other
  • one actor holds and throws a bowling pin (massFX)
  • A 12-frame storyboard that is displayed in Unity
  • an elaborate set that has lights, shadows, and materials.
  • dialogue

The scenes and audio will loops once they complete.

The Player can walk around and explore.

There are barriers that prevent the player from getting off course.
